MetaTags.home: IMPEX CORP || Import-export of cars from the UAE, Korea and China
MetaTags.defaultDescription: LLC "Impex-Corp" provides services for the purchase and import of cars from Korea, China, UAE and other countries.

GreetingBlock.title: Welcome to Impex Corp car dealership!
GreetingBlock.text: Welcome to Impex Corp car dealership! Impex Corp is a company specializing in the automotive industry, offering its clients a wide range of products and services. Holding leading positions in the market, Impex Corp stands out for its key advantages, making it the perfect choice for buyers.

firstBlock.title1: Security, reliability, and style in every detail!

AboutUs.main_title: The company "Impex Corp" offers services for purchasing and importing cars from Korea, China and other countries.
AboutUs.title: Our advantages

card1.text: We provide selection and delivery of specialized equipment and machinery, as well as offer a wide range of spare parts, accessories, and automotive chemicals.

card2.text: In less than a year, our company has successfully concluded over 100 contracts with more than 7 countries and 30 cities in the CIS, confirming our reliability and professionalism.

card3.text: We are actively expanding in the field of import and export of food products and tourism, extending the geographical scope of our operations and strengthening our positions in the global market.

back.text2: - your pathway to confident car purchases or orders with us.

AboutUs.bottomTitle: Our company specializes in importing and exporting cars from various countries, including China, Korea, Japan, the UAE, Georgia, Europe, and the USA, providing clients with access to a wide selection of high-quality vehicles.
